alerts.text: I am still working on testing my mods for the For Rent expansion pack patch (December 5, 2023). You should wait until I either announce them as working or release updates. Keep an eye on this website, my Twitter, or my Discord server for updates.

Language Barriers and Show Sim Info are both confirmed broken with the patch. Avoid using Language Barriers until an update is available, as it can prevent sims from aging up and throw internal data out of sync. Show Sim Info simply does not work, but won't harm your game.
